title: Last activity you solved few questions. In this activity we give you some questions on What is Debugging, try to answer those questions

options.option: tracking down programming errors and correcting them.
options.feedback: Correct! Programming errors are called bugs and the process of finding and removing them from a program is called debugging.

options.option: removing all the bugs from your house.
options.feedback: Incorrect. Maybe, but that is not what we are talking about in this context.

options.option: finding all the bugs in the program.
options.feedback: Incorrect. This is partially correct. But, debugging is more than just finding the bugs. What do you need to do once you find them?

options.option: fixing the bugs in the program.
options.feedback: Incorrect. This is partially correct. But, debugging is more than just fixing the bugs. What do you need to do before you can fix them?
